relatedBlades.title: Risk posture management
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare for Unified Risk Posture reduces risk while also reducing the effort required from SecOps teams.

Evaluate risk, exchange data with other tools, and enforce controls everywhere with automated and dynamic risk posture enforcement.

relatedBlades.title: Attack surfaces are growing, managing risk is too complex
relatedBlades.copy: Managing risk has become increasingly complex and inefficient, especially as businesses embrace hybrid work, build new digital apps, and more recently, experiment with AI. Meanwhile, sprawling security tools designed to cope with this expanding attack surface result in visibility gaps, alert fatigue, and false positives.

imageAssetFile.altText: Illustration of a risk posture problem
imageAssetFile.title: Attack surfaces are growing

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a risk posture problem

columnContent.title: Growing attack surface
columnContent.description: Vulnerabilities multiply as businesses embrace hybrid work, build new digital apps and experiences, and pursue digital transformation.

columnContent.title: Too many tools, too many alerts
columnContent.description: Security teams are overwhelmed with data from siloed and outdated tools with limited visibility and compatibility across IT environments.

columnContent.title: Manual effort and wasted time
columnContent.description: Security teams spend inordinate time and effort juggling disparate tools and reacting to a deluge of alerts, many of which pose no risk.

relatedBlades.title: Mitigate risk across your attack surface with less effort
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare for Unified Risk Posture brings multiple aspects of risk posture management together in one fully integrated security platform.

imageAssetFile.altText: Diagram Cloudflare for Unified Risk Posture
imageAssetFile.title: Diagram Cloudflare for Unified Risk Posture

relatedBlades.eyebrowHeading: Manage risk posture for your business

columnContent.title: Evaluate risk from people and apps
columnContent.description: Advanced risk scoring models detect suspicious user behavior, malicious payloads, and zero-day threats.

columnContent.title: Exchange risk data with partners
columnContent.description: Ingest risk scores from EPP and IDP vendors. Share telemetry with SIEM and XDR platforms.

columnContent.title: Enforce automated risk controls at scale
columnContent.description: Enforce consistent security policies for people and apps across any location in the world.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare customers boosted security team efficiency by 29%
relatedBlades.copy: New Forrester research found that Cloudflare security services improved security efficiency via centralized visibility, faster detection, and more.

button.elementName: New Forrester study - Cloudflare customers boosted security team efficiency by 29% - CTA

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Faster response times, lower costs, and less wasted time

statsFeatures.description: improvement in response times to security and performance incidents
reduction in total cost of ownership (TCO) of security and IT investments
reduced time spent on managing systems/processes*

relatedBlades.title: Global leaders, including 30% of the Fortune 1000, rely on Cloudflare
Explore how Cloudflare can help you manage risk posture
Strong security controls and risk scoring, via our connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare combines analyst-recognized [SASE](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/sase/) and [WAAP](https://blog.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-waap-named-leader-gartner-magic-quadrant-2022) capabilities with a rich partner ecosystem for complete risk posture management, delivered anywhere in the world via our [connectivity cloud](https://www.cloudflare.com/connectivity-cloud/).

columnContent.title: Dynamic risk scoring
columnContent.description: Detect and adapt to suspicious activity by users, attackers, bots, and more.

columnContent.title: Apply posture checks
columnContent.description: Check for identity and device posture for access requests with your IDP or EPP.

columnContent.title: Logpush for further analysis
columnContent.description: Enrich investigations in your XDR and SIEM platforms with [Cloudflare Logs](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/cloudflare-logs/).

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare helps Indeed manage risk

content.value: Indeed is the No. 1 job site in the world (Comscore, Total Visits, October 2023) and allows job seekers to search millions of jobs in more than 60 countries and 28 languages.
More than 350 million unique visitors use Indeed each month to search for jobs, post resumes, research companies, and more.
Cloudflare is helping us mitigate risk more effectively with less effort and simplifies how we deliver Zero Trust across my organization.

relatedBlades.quoteCompanyPosition: SVP, Chief Information Officer and Chief Security Officer

features.title: Carrefour
features.description: Cloudflare's unified security platform slashes Carrefour's incident resolution time by 75%, saving time and money while enhancing the customer experience.

features.title: LendingTree
features.description: Leveraging Cloudflare solutions for DDoS, Bot Management, and Rate Limiting, LendingTree was able to save $250,000 over five months by stopping API endpoint abuse.

features.title: The State of Arizona
features.description: Cloudflare protects offices for 100+ U.S. civilian agencies with DNS filtering.

features.title: GPC
features.description: Cloudflare protects 900+ GPC websites, giving them complete visibility into threats across their entire digital footprint.

features.title: Bouvet
features.description: Cloudflare helps Bouvet modernize threat defense across employees and infrastructure.
